Encounter.Name: Gladiator Night - Round 1, Fight 3
Encounter.Notes: This is the third fight, K'elana the Weequay VS. Morko the Gamorrean. [P] A clash of styles here in this fight. K'elana relies on swift movements and mobility, while the Gamorrean uses his brute strength. If one of your PC's is competing and is a more agile and maneuverable oppoenent, you may wish to switch them out with K'elana to see if their swift action is enough to avoid the brute force of a Gamorrean. [P] The winner will proceed to round 2, use these encounters as a template to make round 2, and round 3 (the finals).
